name: GoTeams
description: GoTeams delivers no-bullshit execution to entrepreneurs who are ready to get serious: We form long-term product and tech teams. Truly Plug & Play. Business Aware. Built to Scale. By Entrepreneurs, for Entrepreneurs.
slogan: Dedicated Tech Teams for Digital Excellence
keywords: dedicated tech teams, software development, web development, mobile development, backend development, devops, quality assurance, full-stack development, technology consulting, disrupt with AI, product management, project management, startup tech teams, corporate technology solutions

itemListElement.name: Find new business
itemListElement.description: GoTeams empowers entrepreneurs and established companies to scout, filter, and validate new business opportunities. Fast, focused, and backed by real market feedback.

itemListElement.name: Establish new business
itemListElement.description: GoTeams empowers entrepreneurs and established companies to convert ideas into new business with a revenue impact.

itemListElement.name: Scale New Business
itemListElement.description: GoTeams empowers entrepreneurs and established companies to scale their existing business.

itemListElement.name: AI Disruption
itemListElement.description: GoTeams empowers entrepreneurs and established companies to disrupt their industries with AI.

itemListElement.name: AI Efficiency
itemListElement.description: GoTeams empowers entrepreneurs and established companies to boost their companies efficiency with AI.

itemListElement.name: Research and Development and Innovation
itemListElement.description: GoTeams empowers Strategy-, R&D-, and Innovation teams to turn ideas into real revenue and business traction.

itemListElement.name: Business Units
itemListElement.description: GoTeams empowers individual business units to grow and accelerate.

itemListElement.name: PE Owners and Investors
itemListElement.description: GoTeams empowers Owners and PE firms to realise new business initiatives without affecting the existing business.

additionalProperty.name: Approach
additionalProperty.value: Entrepreneurial ownership mindset beyond traditional agency models

additionalProperty.name: Team Integration
additionalProperty.value: Deep integration into partner's businesses with full project ownership
